<Link id="l00067" /><CodeLine lineNumber="67"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// =&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00068" /><CodeLine lineNumber="68"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// S&#95;CBRANCH&#95;EXEC&#91;N&#93;Z</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00069" /><CodeLine lineNumber="69"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// We end up with this pattern sometimes after basic block placement.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00070" /><CodeLine lineNumber="70"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// It happens while combining a block which assigns -1 or 0 to a saved mask</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00071" /><CodeLine lineNumber="71"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// and another block which consumes that saved mask and then a branch.</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00072" /><CodeLine lineNumber="72"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">//</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00073" /><CodeLine lineNumber="73"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// While searching this also performs the following substitution:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00074" /><CodeLine lineNumber="74"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vcc = V&#95;CMP</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00075" /><CodeLine lineNumber="75"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// vcc = S&#95;AND exec, vcc</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00076" /><CodeLine lineNumber="76"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// S&#95;CBRANCH&#95;VCC&#91;N&#93;Z</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00077" /><CodeLine lineNumber="77"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// =&gt;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00306" /><CodeLine lineNumber="306"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability">BranchProbability</a> BranchProb;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00307" /><CodeLine lineNumber="307"><Highlight kind="normal">  </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">static</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">constexpr</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> uint64&#95;t BranchNotTakenCost = 1;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00308" /><CodeLine lineNumber="308"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t BranchTakenCost;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00309" /><CodeLine lineNumber="309"><Highlight kind="normal">  uint64&#95;t ThenCyclesCost = 0;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00310" /><CodeLine lineNumber="310"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00311" /><CodeLine lineNumber="311"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">public</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal">:</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00312" /><CodeLine lineNumber="312" lineLink="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sipreemitpeephole-cpp-/branchweightcostmodel/#aa842d0e2dfc3a19e513d9098c7e4d00e"><Highlight kind="normal">  <a href="/docs/api/classes/anonymous-namespace-sipreemitpeephole-cpp-/branchweightcostmodel/#aa842d0e2dfc3a19e513d9098c7e4d00e">BranchWeightCostModel</a>(</Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/siinstrinfo">SIInstrInfo</a> &amp;TII, </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machineinstr">MachineInstr</a> &amp;Branch,</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00314" /><CodeLine lineNumber="314"><Highlight kind="normal">      : TII(TII), SchedModel(TII.getSchedModel()) &#123;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00315" /><CodeLine lineNumber="315"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock">MachineBasicBlock</a> &amp;Head = &#42;Branch.getParent();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00316" /><CodeLine lineNumber="316"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">const</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> </Highlight><Highlight kind="keyword">auto</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> &#42;FromIt = <a href="/docs/api/namespaces/llvm/#a086e9fbdb06276db7753101a08a63adf">find</a>(Head.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#ad88ff1529541fb4e243cc8ed90b11131">successors</a>(), &amp;Succ);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00317" /><CodeLine lineNumber="317"><Highlight kind="normal">    <a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/target/lib/target/amdgpu/silowercontrolflow-cpp/#a4868c5d81c5ccc98c47aeab6244346a0">assert</a>(FromIt != Head.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a3ddd708642d60c1661992ff8ba1b215d">succ&#95;end</a>());</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00318" /><CodeLine lineNumber="318"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00319" /><CodeLine lineNumber="319"><Highlight kind="normal">    BranchProb = Head.<a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/machinebasicblock/#a34b15764a81fb89e68d85d5aae76f20f">getSuccProbability</a>(FromIt);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00320" /><CodeLine lineNumber="320"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">if</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (BranchProb.isUnknown())</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00321" /><CodeLine lineNumber="321"><Highlight kind="normal">      BranchProb = <a href="/docs/api/classes/llvm/branchprobability/#afd00958cba7080048a84cccfcef55d71">BranchProbability::getZero</a>();</Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00323" /><CodeLine lineNumber="323"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00324" /><CodeLine lineNumber="324"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>

<Link id="l00329" /><CodeLine lineNumber="329"><Highlight kind="normal">    ThenCyclesCost += SchedModel.computeInstrLatency(&amp;<a href="/docs/api/files/lib/lib/codegen/lib/codegen/globalisel/irtranslator-cpp/#abe44dfdea65b4f7e11e0a608ab708b76">MI</a>);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00330" /><CodeLine lineNumber="330"><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00331" /><CodeLine lineNumber="331"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// Consider &#96;P = N/D&#96; to be the probability of execz being false (skipping</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00332" /><CodeLine lineNumber="332"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// the then-block) The transformation is profitable if always executing the</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00333" /><CodeLine lineNumber="333"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#39;then&#39; block is cheaper than executing sometimes &#39;then&#39; and always</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00334" /><CodeLine lineNumber="334"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// executing s&#95;cbranch&#95;execz:</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00335" /><CodeLine lineNumber="335"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#42; ThenCost &lt;= P&#42;ThenCost + (1-P)&#42;BranchTakenCost + P&#42;BranchNotTakenCost</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00336" /><CodeLine lineNumber="336"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#42; (1-P) &#42; ThenCost &lt;= (1-P)&#42;BranchTakenCost + P&#42;BranchNotTakenCost</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00337" /><CodeLine lineNumber="337"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// &#42; (D-N)/D &#42; ThenCost &lt;= (D-N)/D &#42; BranchTakenCost + N/D &#42;</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00338" /><CodeLine lineNumber="338"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="comment">// BranchNotTakenCost</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"></Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00339" /><CodeLine lineNumber="339"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t Numerator = BranchProb.getNumerator();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00340" /><CodeLine lineNumber="340"><Highlight kind="normal">    uint64&#95;t Denominator = BranchProb.getDenominator();</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00341" /><CodeLine lineNumber="341"><Highlight kind="normal">    </Highlight><Highlight kind="keywordflow">return</Highlight><Highlight kind="normal"> (Denominator - Numerator) &#42; ThenCyclesCost &lt;=</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00342" /><CodeLine lineNumber="342"><Highlight kind="normal">           ((Denominator - Numerator) &#42; BranchTakenCost +</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00343" /><CodeLine lineNumber="343"><Highlight kind="normal">            Numerator &#42; BranchNotTakenCost);</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00344" /><CodeLine lineNumber="344"><Highlight kind="normal">  &#125;</Highlight></CodeLine>
<Link id="l00345" /><CodeLine lineNumber="345"><Highlight kind="normal">&#125;;</Highlight></CodeLine>
